Returns:
bool if normalized, return true

Definition at line 278 of file Vertex.cpp.

00279 {
00280         float l = length();
00281         if (l == 0.0f)
00282         {
00283                 return false;
00284         }
00285         m_x = m_x / l;
00286         m_y = m_y / l;
00287         m_z = m_z / l;
00288         return true;
00289 }

void Vertex::rotate ( float  alpha,
float  beta,
float  gamma 
)

Rotates the current vector using phi, theta, rho

Parameters:
[in] alpha angle to turn arround x
[in] beta angle to turn arround y
[in] gamma angle to turn arround z

Definition at line 297 of file Vertex.cpp.

00298 {
00299         // convert from deg to rad
00300         double alpha_rad = alpha * M_PI / 180.0;
00301         double beta_rad = beta * M_PI / 180.0;
00302         double gamma_rad = gamma * M_PI / 180.0;
00303         
00304         double sa = sin(alpha_rad);
00305         double sb = sin(beta_rad);
00306         double sg = sin(gamma_rad);
00307         double ca = cos(alpha_rad);
00308         double cb = cos(beta_rad);
00309         double cg = cos(gamma_rad);
00310         
00311         // calculate the new values
00312         float newx = m_x*ca*cb + m_y*(ca*sb*sg - sa*cg) + m_z*(ca*sb*cg + sa*sg);
00313         float newy = m_x*sa*cb + m_y*(sa*sb*sg + ca*cg) + m_z*(sa*sb*cg - ca*sg);
00314         float newz = -m_x*sb + m_y*(cb*sg) + m_z*(cb*cg);
00315         
00316         // write back the new values
00317         m_x = newx;
00318         m_y = newy;
00319         m_z = newz;
00320 }

00328         // read out angles from vertex to use rotate3f
00329         float phi   = angles.getX();
00330         float theta = angles.getY();
00331         float rho   = angles.getZ();
00332
